captions.text:
I HOPE YOU KNOW YOU'RE
CLEANING THAT UP, LAWRENCE.

UNLESS YOU WANT
ANOTHER REASON
TO BE SUSPENDED.

ANYWHO, WE'RE OFF
FOR A QUICK JAUNT ROUND
THE RACQUETBALL COURT.

UM, SO YOU KNOW HOW
I'M UNDECLARED RIGHT NOW?

WELL, I WAS THINKING THAT
I WOULD SHADOW FPS TOMORROW.

I CAN'T WAIT
TO SEE YOU THERE.

I CAN'T BELIEVE SHE'S MAKING US
PRACTICE THROUGH BRUNCH.

YEAH, JENNY,
TELL YOUR MOM
MY STOMACH SAID,

"HEY, THIS IS
YOUR STOMACH,
JUMPIN' JACKS,

AND I'M HUNGRY,
SO TELL JENNY."

YEAH, I'LL BE SURE
AND PASS THAT ALONG.

BUT IN THE MEANTIME,
WHAT DO I DO WITH THESE DONUTS?

EVERY TIME YOU STUFF THOSE
LITTLE FACES WITH JUNK FOOD,

YOU ARE MISSING OUT
ON THORINE, OMEGA-3S,
ANTIOXIDANTS.

30 LAPS AROUND THE QUAD
BEFORE LUNCH.

SO HOW IS IT
LIVING WITH LAW?

WELL, ACTUALLY
IT IS TOO HOT

BECAUSE, UH,
HE SET FIRE TO MY ROOM.

REALLY? HE SOUNDS MISERABLE.
GOOD WORK, KID.

WAIT. THAT'S WHY
YOU MADE HIM
MY ROOMMATE?

I KNEW LIVING WITH YOU
WOULD REMIND HIM
OF WHAT A FAILURE HE IS.

BETWEEN YOU AND ME,
HE'S THE WORST GUY
THAT JENNY EVER DATED.

OH, WELL, BETWEEN YOU AND ME,
HE SET FIRE TO MY ROOM.

YOU JUST BEING CUTE,
OR YOU TALKING BACK TO ME?

WHICH BRINGS US TO THE CRUX
OF THE QUERY:

HOW FAST SHOULD CAR "A's"
SPEED BE GOING INTO TURN 7?

PICK ME! PICK ME,
I'M AWESOME!

GIVEN HIS ENTRY LINE,
HE SHOULD BE GOING
55 MILES PER HOUR.

YOU HAVE PASSED 
THE SODA STAR.

WHERE ARE PISTON
AND DOMINO PRIME?

SHE AND HER KART GOONS
KNEW OF OUR PLAN

THEY AMBUSHED US
AND TOOK THE SODA,

BUT ALAS, THE DUCHESS OF KART
HAS RENDERED US SODALESS.

OUR THROATS SHALL
REMAIN PARCHED FOR A WEEK.

TRULY THIS IS
OUR DARKEST HOUR.

I CAN DO IT, D.K.
I WAS BORN TO.

THOSE 'SHROOMED-UP KART SHARKS
WILL EAT YOU ALIVE.

DRIFT LIKE THE WIND,
LITTLE ONE.

YOU CARRY
THE FATE OF US ALL.

BRIAN D! GET YOUR ASS
TO MY OFFICE!

YOU KNOW ANY BRASSERIES THAT DO
LAST-MINUTE LUNCH REZZIES?

I COULD REALLY CRUSH A GOOD
WINE-AND-CHEESE PAIRING

AFTER YOU GIVE ME
THOSE TWO G's.

SORRY, SHANE. THE ONLY THING
ON THE MENU IS A FLANK STEAK.

OH. IS THAT YOU FLANKING ME,
OR ARE YOU JUST TRYING

TO MAKE THE WHOLE FOOD JOKE
THING WORK?

EITHER WAY I'M WINNING,
SO, ABOUT THOSE TWO G's,

IF YOU COULD JUST
TYPE THEM IN NOW FOR ME.

SO IF YOU REGROUP
IN THE MOUNTAINS TO THE SOUTH--

OH. KI SWAN, 1,500 POINTS.
EX-RHYTHM GAMER.

I HAVE BEEN SHADOWING
CLASSES ALL DAY LONG,

AND I HAVE TO SAY THAT RTS
IS THE FIRST ONE

THAT HAS REALLY
SPOKEN TO ME, WHICH IS
WHY I'M SPEAKING NOW,

AND I WOULD BE HONORED
TO TRY OUT FOR YOUR TEAM.

I DON'T KNOW, KI.
ARE YOU COOL?

IT'S NOT COOL
TO TELL THE TRUTH.

BUT WE'LL GIVE IT
TO THE FLOOR. BUY OR SELL?

- SHE DOESN'T
EVEN WEAR A SUIT.
- SHE LOOKS LIKE A SQUARE.

OH, SHE'S NICE ONCE
YOU GET TO KNOW HER.

SHE TALKS ABOUT HERSELF
IN THE THIRD PERSON.

SORRY, KI.
GO SUCK SOMEWHERE ELSE.

NOTHING BETTER THAN
A FOURTH TACO, YOU FEEL ME?

THE NEA PULLED
THE GOLDEN GUN GRANT,

I HAVE NO MONEY,
SO IS THERE LIKE, UH,

LIKE A WORK-STUDY PROGRAM
I COULD DO?

LIKE, MAYBE I COULD
START IN THE LIBRARY
AND DO SOME FILING.

OR, HEY, DO YOU NEED
A PERSONAL ASSISTANT?
I MAKE A MEAN CUP OF JOE.

YOU CAN START NOW,
WITH ALL THAT.

SO YOU WANT ME TO JUST,
LIKE, PUT IT BACK?

- ( sharp gasp )
- WHO'S IN THIS BOX?

HE'S GONE.
YOU CAN COME OUT.

HEY, THANKS FOR THE SAVE
BACK THERE.
OH, UM... MY NAME IS TED.

OH, MY GOD!
I JUST CHEATED ON KI!

TED, YOUR ENTIRE FLOOR
IS YELLING AT ME

ABOUT SOME GUY ACTING GROSS
IN THE STUDY ROOM,

SO JUST ACT LIKE AN R.A.
FOR ONCE AND DEAL WITH IT.

- WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
- GET OUT OF MY ROOM.

I AM OUT OF YOUR ROOM.
THIS IS TED'S ROOM.

NO, TED MOVED IN
WITH BRIAN,

AND JENNY NEVER
SHOWED ME MY ROOM,
SO I MOVED INTO TED'S ROOM.

WHY IS THAT SO HARD
FOR PEOPLE TO UNDERSTAND?

I UNDERSTAND.
TELL TED HE'S FIRED...

- ...AND YOU'RE
HIS REPLACEMENT.
- WHAT? YOU CAN'T DO THAT.

ACTUALLY, AS HEAD R.A.,
I CAN DO WHATEVER
I WANT, PROBABLY.

EITHER WAY, LOOKS LIKE
YOU FOUND YOURSELF
SOMETHING TO DO, KI.

HERE. TRYING
TO GET RID OF THESE.

I WAS VOTED "PETITE ELITE'S"
HUNKIEST TEEN GAMER.

WELL, LOOK AT ME NOW,
WENDELL!

I DON'T WANT TO, OKAY?
I JUST WANT TO STUDY.

I THINK YOU
SHOULD GO BE GROSS
SOMEWHERE ELSE NOW.

UM, OKAY, SO IF YOU
COULD JUST STOP--

WELL, NOW, HOW WOULD YOU
FEEL IF SOMEONE--

LAW, THIS IS
AN INAPPROPRIATE USE
OF THE COMMON AREA,

AND YOU ARE DISRESPECTING
YOUR FELLOW STUDENTS,

WELL, WE GOTTA UPHOLD
THE RULES AROUND HERE,
RIGHT, WENDELL?

WE ALL KNOW HOW IMPORTANT
THE LAW IS AROUND HERE!

WOW. I HAVE NO IDEA
WHAT I EVER SAW IN THAT GUY.

EAT LATER, BRIAN!
TWENTY LAPS BEFORE
PRACTICE. LET'S GO!

COME ON, BRIAN,
THE JANITOR WILL GET IT.

FOR QUENCHING THE THIRST
OF YOUR TEAMMATES

AND RISKING CERTAIN DETENTION
IN THE PROCESS,

CLUTCH, AN ICE-COOL
COLA FOR TED.

I BELIEVED IN YOU
ALL ALONG, TED.

SO, REGALE US
WITH YOUR TALES
OF DERRING-DO.

OPENING THE DOOR
TO THE TEACHERS' LOUNGE,

AND THEN
TAKING ALL THE SODAS,

AH, WHICH REMINDS ME.
MY KEY.

THE MOST PRECIOUS
OF MY ITEMS.

D.K., YOU'RE SO CUTE
WHEN YOU'RE ANGRY.

CUTE? DON'T LECTURE ME
ABOUT CUTE

WHEN YOUR GAME HAS
A BANANA ON THE COVER,

THEY GO,
"OW WOW WOW WOW WOW."

WE'RE NOT GETTING
INTO THIS AGAIN.

ENJOY YOUR HIGH HORSE.
WE'LL ENJOY OUR SODAS.

COME BY
FOR A DRINK SOMETIME.

THEODORE!
I'M NOT SURE WHAT SORT OF

MODERN ARRANGEMENTS
YOU AND KI HAVE,

BUT YOU HAVE HURT ME
MORE DEEPLY THAN YOU
CAN EVER IMAGINE.

The Law: "DEAR KI,
I'D LIKE TO APOLOGIZE

"FOR BEING TOTALLY RUDESVILLE
IN THE STUDY LOUNGE,

"BUT I'D ALSO LIKE TO FILE
A FORMAL COMPLAINT

"YOU SEE, TED NEVER OFFICIALLY
MOVED IN WITH BRIAN.

"AND TED-- WELL, HE'S
YOUR KISSIN' BUDDY,

"I DON'T NEED TO TELL YOU
HOW BAD HE SMELLS. PHEW!!

"WOW, I CAN'T BELIEVE I WROTE
'PHEW' IN A LETTER.

"WELL, ANYWAY, IT'S YOUR DUTY
AS R.A. TO KICK HIM OUT.
HA HA HA HA HA HA!

WATCHING YOU PLAY NOW
MAKES ME WANT TO THROW UP.

YOU CAN DO THIS.
DON'T THINK ABOUT FOOD.

DON'T THINK ABOUT FOOD.
JUST DON'T THINK ABOUT FOOD.

PLEASE, COME ON,
I'M SO HUNGRY!

BRIAN, IS THAT JELLY
ON YOUR SHIRT?

- GET OUT OF MY PRACTICE.
- WAIT, COACH, I HADN'T EATEN--

DON'T COME TO PRACTICE
TOMORROW, EITHER.

YOU WANT
TO SAY ANYTHING ELSE?

Woman: JUST REMEMBER, GUYS:
NO GETTYSBURGER IS COMPLETE

SO HYPOTHETICALLY, IF
THE DUCHESS OF KART KISSED ME

AND I DIDN'T WANT TO KISS HER
AND I DIDN'T LIKE IT,

NO, AS LONG AS YOU WERE
HONEST ABOUT IT.

HEY, TED, YOU GOT
A THING ON THE THING.

I'M GETTING EVICTED?
THIS CAN'T BE HAPPENING.

EVERYTHING IS FINE.
THIS WAS A JOKE. I MADE IT.

HOW COULD YOU EVEN THINK
ABOUT SEPARATING ME AND BRIAN?

WE'RE MORE THAN
JUST BRIAN AND TED.

AND YOU CAN'T SEPARATE
SLICES OF BREAD,

UNLESS YOU PUT MEAT
OR LETTUCE IN BETWEEN,

BUT THEN YOU GET
A SANDWICH, KI,

AND NOTHING
CAN STOP A SANDWICH

FROM GETTING THE KEY
BACK FROM THE DUCHESS,

AS LONG AS THAT SANDWICH
IS NAMED ME AND BRIAN.

BY THE WAY, BRIAN, I NEED
YOUR HELP ON SOMETHING.

THANKS FOR
THE PEP TALK, KI.

TEDDY BEAR!
HERE FOR THAT DRINK?

NO WAY, "DORKCHESS."
I'M HERE FOR D.K.'S KEY.

OH, YEAH, HE'S TOUGH.
HE'S TOUGHER THAN ALL...

BUT WE'RE TAKING THIS RUMBLE
TO THE STREETS...

I WIN,
I GET THE KEY BACK.
I WIN, YOU JOIN MY TEAM.

Ted, this is crazy.
There's no way
we can beat 'em.

Plus, it wasn't
even your fault.

I let my team down.
I gotta make that right...

AND THAT BRINGS US FINALLY
TO ARTICLE G, SECTION 2:

TO STOP HIM
FROM BEING SO SMELLY.

SIGN THERE, AND TED
BECOMES YOUR NEW ROOMMATE.

HAVE BEEN A LITTLE
TOUGH, BUT, UH...

YOU'RE STICKING
YOUR NECK OUT FOR ME,

AND NOT MANY PEOPLE
ARE WILLING TO DO
THAT THESE DAYS,

SO I JUST WANTED TO SAY
I APPRECIATE IT.

- JUST TRYING
TO DO MY JOB.
- SURE.

YOU GOT EVERYTHING YOU WANTED.
WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS?

AND NOW, YOU'RE GOING
TO HAVE TO EXPLAIN

THAT THEY CAN'T BE
ROOMMATES ANYMORE.
NOW, GET OUT OF MY ROOM.

I'M GONNA NEED
A BIGGER BOX.

THIS IS TED'S FAVORITE PIZZA,
DOUBLE WASABINERO.

BRIAN HATES IT WHEN
YOU BORROW HIS SHAMPOO

AND, UH, SPRAY IT
ALL OVER HIS BED.

YOU REALLY SHOULDN'T
HAVE DONE THIS, LAW.

THIS IS BRIAN AND TED'S
FAVORITE PHOTO.

COME ON. YOU REALLY WANT
TED TO LEAVE AND MISS OUT

ON THE CHANCE
TO MAKE THEM MISERABLE
EVERY SINGLE DAY?

WE PLAY THIS GAME
EVERY DAY!
I FEEL LIKE A NEW MAN.

BOY, TED IS GOING
TO BE EXTRA UPSET
WHEN I HAVE YOU EVICT HIM!

RESOLVED BY PUNCHING ME
IN THE FACE.

AND THEN, OUT OF NOWHERE,
IT WAS LIKE...

AND I WAS LIKE,
"OH, NO, I'M GONNA DIE."

YEAH, AND THEN
WE WON LATER.
IT WAS AWESOME.

I GOT SOMEWHERE
I GOTTA BE.

LAW! WHAT DID YOU
DO TO MY ROOM?

OUR ROOM, TED!
WHAT DID I DO TO OUR ROOM?

THIS ISN'T YOUR ROOM!
GET-- GET OUT!

OH, DON'T YOU LIKE
HOW IT SMELLS NOW?

OH, I'M SO SORRY
ABOUT YOUR PIZZA, TED!

OH! OH, MY GOD!
MY BOOKS!

THEY'RE RUINED!
LOOK AT THIS PLACE!

FIGURED I'D GET
MY OWN PRACTICE IN EARLY.

IT'S WHOLE-GRAIN BAGELS
AND HUMMUS FOR THE TEAM.

WELL, ACTUALLY,
I'VE BEEN AWAKE FOR,
LIKE, 24 HOURS.

title: Video Game High School (VGHS) - S2: Ep. 2
